verses.roman:
jñātvā mama mataṁ sādhvi
pitā duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ
bṛhatsena iti khyātas
tatropāyam acīkarat

synonyms: jñātvā—knowing; mama—my; matam—mentality; sādhvi—O saintly lady; pitā—my father; duhitṛ—to his daughter; vatsalaḥ—affectionate; bṛhatsenaḥ iti khyātaḥ—known as Bṛhatsena; tatra—toward this end; upāyam—a means; acīkarat—arranged.
translation: My father, Bṛhatsena, was by nature compassionate to his daughter, and knowing how I felt, O saintly lady, he arranged to fulfill my desire.
